title: Bug 103963: No Friendly Error Message When Series Data is Absent
description: The current behavior does not provide a friendly error message when there is no data for a series.
OB: No indication or message is displayed when attempting to view a series with no data.
EB: If there is no data for a series, the system should display a friendly error message to notify the user.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Navigate to a series with no data.
2. Observe the lack of a friendly error message.
